info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:13PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Yuma County through 945 PM MDT... At 913 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Eckley to 21 miles northeast of Cope. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wray around 920 PM MDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 216 and 255. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northwestern Kansas...and southwestern Nebraska.
